fn.p: Competing Interests: The authors have declared that no competing interests exist.

Funding: This project was funded by the University of Helsinki ( www.helsinki.fi/university/index.html), the Finnish Graduate School on Applied Bioscience ( www.vetmed.helsinki.fi/abs/), the Finnish Veterinary Foundation ( www.etts.fi). The project was supported by the HUS-EVO grant TYH2008309 ( www.hus.fi/default.asp?path=1,28,2530,15595,2539), the Research Foundation of the University of Helsinki grant TA 715321 (project 2103039) ( www.helsinki.fi/tiedesaatio/english/index.htm), the Finnish Foundation for Veterinary Sciences ( www.sell.fi/elainlaakariliitto/linkkeja_ja_tietolahteita/suomen_elainlaaketieteen_saatio_/), the Orion Farmos Foundation for Research and Science ( http://www.orion.fi/Tutkimus-ja-tuotekehitys/Orion-Farmos-Tutkimussaatio/), the Emil Aaltonen Foundation ( www.emilaaltonen.fi/brieflyeng.html) and the Finnish Foundation for Research on Viral Diseases ( www.virustauti.fi). The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
